description: Detects specific patterns found after a successful ProxyLogon exploitation in relation to a Commandlet invocation of Set-OabVirtualDirectory Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: ProxyLogon MSExchange OabVirtualDirectory
query: ((*OabVirtualDirectory* AND *\ \-ExternalUrl\ *) AND (*eval\(request* OR *http\:\/\/f\/<script* OR *\"unsafe\"\};* OR *function\ Page_Load\(\)*))
